data.title: Danny Glover: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Danny Glover: Check out the list of all Danny Glover movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Danny Glover news on Times of India.
data.text:
Samuel L. Jackson, Danny Glover to receive honorary Oscars

Reuters / Jun 25, 2021, 14:34 (IST)

Actors Samuel L. Jackson and Danny Glover are among four people who will receive honorary Oscars next year for their contributions to filmmaking and the world, the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced on Thursday.

Harry Belafonte's virtual birthday party: Jay-Z, Tiffany Haddish, Pete Buttigieg added to attendees list

ANI / Feb 24, 2021, 17:44 (IST)

American rapper Jay-Z, actor Tiffany Haddish, singer Usher, Lin-Manuel Miranda, Charlamagne Tha God, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Susan Sarandon, and Pete Buttigieg are the latest guests announced to appear at 'The Gathering of Harry,' a surprise virtual party for singer Harry Belafonte's 94th birthday.

Bengali dubbed version of John Cusack starrer Hollywood movie 2012 to air this weekend

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Sep 11, 2020, 11:59 (IST)

The movie, which grossed well on the box office across the globe, stars John Cusack, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Amanda Peet, Oliver Plat, Thandie Newton, Danny Glover, Woody Harrelson. The movies telling the end of the world tale are mostly entertaining and 2012 isn’t an exception.

Dwayne Johnson: Kevin Hart has a different energy after the accident

TNN / Dec 07, 2019, 01:00 (IST)

"Things change when you’re wearing a silk shirt. Call me Kevin Escobar, man!" When Kevin Hart’s been speaking to Dwayne Johnson like that in Mexico, you don’t try to mess with him. More so when you catch up with the two and you realise that he is wearing – what else – a silk shirt.

Dwayne Johnson: It was an honour for Kevin Hart and me to play Danny DeVito and Danny Glover in 'Jumanji: The Next Level'

TNN / Nov 25, 2019, 17:00 (IST)

'Jumanji: The Next Level' will see two Hollywood legends, Danny DeVito and Danny Glover, join the film's team on their video game adventure. The new film starts off where the last one ended

Video: Don't miss Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson and Kevin Hart's hilarious banter as they promote 'Jumanji: The Next Level'

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Nov 21, 2019, 23:35 (IST)

Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson and Kevin Hart will be back with 'Jumanji 2' in December. The cast of the film is currently busy promoting it on various platforms.

Cannes 2019: Selena Gomez looks stunning as she attends the screening of 'The Dead Don't Die'

TNN / May 15, 2019, 16:07 (IST)

Cannes Film Festival is one of the most prominent festivals overseas wherein celebrities across the world came to attend the grand event.

James Caan, Danny Glover to star in 'Bang Bang'

PTI / Feb 18, 2018, 13:58 (IST)

Actor James Caan and Danny Glover have joined the cast of boxing drama 'Bang Bang'. The film, directed by Brendan Walsh, follows the story of an ex-boxing champion who returns home after failing to settle a score with a former opponent seeking one last chance at redemption.

Robert Redford's last film 'The Old Man & The Gun' to release in India in September

PTI / Aug 10, 2018, 12:04 (IST)

'The Old Man & The Gun', which will mark veteran Hollywood star Robert Redford's retirement from acting, is slated to release in India on September 28.

Julianne Moore struggled to get a movie role

PTI / May 06, 2017, 12:33 (IST)

Julianne Moore may have become one of the most popular stars of Hollywood, but the actress says she struggled for years to get a role in a movie.

Kissing a man wasn't a big deal: Rahul Bose

TNN / Jun 01, 2011, 12:35 (IST)

Rahul Bose was in Delhi recently to honor his commitment with an NGO and talks about films, offbeat cinema, kissing a man for his film “I Am” and much more.

152 movie titles, record $27 billion at the box-office: Academy presents honorary Oscar to Samuel L Jackson

AFP / Mar 27, 2022, 10:43 (IST)

No actor's films have made more money in box office history than Samuel L Jackson, but he had never won an Oscar until Friday, when he was awarded an honorary statuette by the Academy.

'Jumanji: The Next Level' collects $60.1 million; overthrows 'Frozen 2' to grab the top spot

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Dec 16, 2019, 15:22 (IST)

Disney’s 'Frozen 2' which had dominated the international box office for nearly three weeks has now been overthrown by 'Jumanji: The Next Level'. With a total collection of $60.1 million at the US box office, Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson starrer has become the highest-earning film of 2019.
